    • findNextExerciseByLessonId

      @Query(value="SELECT\n pl.id_public_user AS id_public_user,\n ex.id AS id_exercise,\n COALESCE(pex.next_review, NOW()) AS next_review,\n COALESCE(pex.rate, 0) AS rate\nFROM public_user_lesson pl\n INNER JOIN lesson l\n ON pl.id_lesson = l.id\n INNER JOIN course c\n ON l.id_course = c.id\n INNER JOIN exercise ex\n ON l.id = ex.id_lesson\n FULL JOIN public_user_exercise pex\n ON ex.id = pex.id_exercise\nWHERE\n pl.id_public_user = :userId AND\n l.id = :lessonId AND\n pl.status != \'pending\'\nORDER BY\n pex.next_review NULLS FIRST,\n pex.rate NULLS FIRST,\n RANDOM()\nLIMIT(1)\n", nativeQuery=true) Optional<PublicUserExerciseEntity> findNextExerciseByLessonId(int userId, int lessonId)
      Specified by:
      findNextExerciseByLessonId in interface PublicUserExerciseRepository

    • findNextExerciseByUserId

      @Query(value="SELECT\n pl.id_public_user AS id_public_user,\n ex.id AS id_exercise,\n COALESCE(pex.next_review, NOW()) AS next_review,\n COALESCE(pex.rate, 0) AS rate\nFROM public_user_lesson pl\n INNER JOIN lesson l\n ON pl.id_lesson = l.id\n INNER JOIN course c\n ON l.id_course = c.id\n INNER JOIN exercise ex\n ON l.id = ex.id_lesson\n FULL JOIN public_user_exercise pex\n ON ex.id = pex.id_exercise\nWHERE\n pl.id_public_user = :userId AND\n pl.status != \'pending\'\nORDER BY\n pex.next_review NULLS FIRST,\n pex.rate NULLS FIRST,\n RANDOM()\nLIMIT(1)\n", nativeQuery=true) Optional<PublicUserExerciseEntity> findNextExerciseByUserId(int userId)
      Specified by:
      findNextExerciseByUserId in interface PublicUserExerciseRepository

    • findAverageRateByLessonId

      @Query(value="SELECT\n COALESCE(AVG(public_user_exercise.rate), 0) AS average_rate\nFROM lesson l\n INNER JOIN exercise\n ON l.id = exercise.id_lesson\n LEFT JOIN public_user_exercise\n ON exercise.id = public_user_exercise.id_exercise\nWHERE\n l.id = :lessonId\nGROUP BY\n l.id\n", nativeQuery=true) Optional<Double> findAverageRateByLessonId(int lessonId)
      Specified by:
      findAverageRateByLessonId in interface PublicUserExerciseRepository
